pr_title: Issue #8876: add github action to generate site

timeline.message: Issue #8876: add github action to generate site
Issue #8876: add github action to generate site

timeline.bodyText: I will create new bucket a bit later
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,120 @@
+#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# Github Action to generate Checkstyle site.
+#
+# Workflow starts when:
+# 1) issue comment - created, edited
+#
+# Requirements:
+# 1) secrets.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID - access key for AWS S3 service user
+# 2) secrets.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY - security access key for AWS S3 service user
+#
+# If you need to change bucket name or region, change AWS_REGION and AWS_BUCKET_NAME variables.
+# For another bucket, you will need to change the secrets.
+#------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+name: Site
+env:
+  AWS_REGION: us-east-2
+  AWS_BUCKET_NAME: "checkstyle-diff-reports"

replies.bodyText: @romani Please make sure that current credentials will have access to it
replies.author: strkkk
